desc.p: Mention the subroutine which is used for processing an incoming Swift message Tag, as given as ID.
If input then must be defined as a type "S" routine on PGM.FILE.
The routine which has to be used for processing an Incoming Swift message tag can be specified here.
Id of this application is the Tag for which the routine is given.
Using this routine, incoming messages details can be mapped to a proper field in FUNDS.TRANSFER application.
The ID is two digit - Alpha Numeric Characters
